name: ChillHop
0:
”Alexa, open chill hop”
”Alexa, start chill hop”
”Alexa, launch chill hop”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chill hop
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Chill Hop presents the ultimate chill tracks to help you study, concentrate, or just relax.

Just open the skill, and let the lo-fi music envelop you in a relaxing cloud of loving chillness.

Simple. Easy. Relaxing. 

The very definition of Chill Hop
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
